prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that glows with a soft pink aura and has big blue eyes.
I want a small psychic-type Pokemon that can float and has a playful demeanor.
Generate a unique Pokemon with a rounded body shape and long tail, resembling a cat.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that can teleport and has a cute, childlike appearance.
Imagine a legendary creature that has a mystical charm and is known for its elusive nature.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of dreams, with a gentle color palette.
Show me an adorable Pokemon that loves to play in grassy fields and explore urban areas.
